ca.mymenuapp.ui.misc

Class BindableAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • ca.mymenuapp.ui.misc.BindableAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class BindableAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    An implementation of BaseAdapter which uses the new/bind pattern for its views.

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION
